parameters: Is that Kann I see over there?
And everyone else is here, too.
We were lookin' for you and Tyvar.
Have you gotten into any trouble?
I didn't even do anything, really──
Did you split up to explore?
Yeah, like I said, everyone else
Sir Tyvar, how's the other side looking?
It'll be difficult to proceed on foot.
Look, there's not many places to
Sir Tyvar's alright since he flies,
but I can't move as easily...
To us walkers, it's as if we are
trapped in the middle of nowhere.
Can't you just ride on Tyvar or something?
You can't ride the wind that easily!
Thank the stars you two are okay.
Tahati, those who cannot fly will be
C-can I really walk on this?
Even though it's okay to walk on it,
it seems to require a little courage...
I'm glad I could fly, honestly.
...Ah, right! I have to call everyone over!
I feel an extraordinary power from this crystal.
As if it is an entire world in itself...
One disagrees with the latter half.
Thou sayeth this is a world?
But it is hard to deny, is it not?
Ino, I must tell you one thing.
Treasure chests are never to be trusted.
You mean while we're traveling, yes?
Unless we're in a treasure trove,
their existence has always been unnatural.
Which means there's a high possibility
In most cases, there are victims around.
a place like this. Use your intuition.
Hey, isn't that Luora over there?
This is a place I've never seen.
I feel an extraordinary power from this crystal.
As if it is an entire world in itself...
One disagrees with the latter half.
Thou sayeth this is a world?
But it is hard to deny, is it not?
